text.p: Gibraltar Mines Ltd said on Thursday it will review all its options in light of Placer Dome Inc's recently announced decision to put its 30.8 percent holding on the block.
Gibraltar's board has established a special committee to consider all options.

"If, as a result of an offer being made to Placer Dome Canada Ltd, an offer is made to all of the shareholders of the company, the special committee will consider such an offer and make recommendations to the shareholders," Gibraltar said in a statement.

"The development of Lomas Bayas is of paramount importance to the future of the company and we are continuing to aggressively pursue alternatives to obtain the balance of the funding necessary to commence development of the project in keeping with the company's existing corporate strategy," said W.H. Myckatyn, president and chief executive, in a statement.
He said Gibraltar was surprised at the timing of the Placer Dome decision.
